text: geuligo geubunkkeseo wiseonhaneun jadeul-eul deuleonaesigi wiham-ila. geudeul-ege mogsoliga deullini ‘geudaedeul-eun hananim-ui gil-eseo jeontue chamjeonhala. animyeon bang-eolado hala.’ geudeul-i malhagil “man-yag uliga jeontuleul al-assdeolamyeon sillo geudaedeul-eul ttalass-eul geos-io.” geudeul-eun inal mid-eumboda bulsin-e deo gakkawossnola. geudeul-eun geudeul-ui ib-eulosseo geudeul-ui ma-eum sog-e eobsneun geos-eul malhadeola. hananimkkeseoneun geudeul-i sumgigo issneun geos-eul nuguboda deo jal asinola
